attributes.action: ask Her Majesty to dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of the recent abuse by Her Majesties Ministers and MP’s over allowances we ask the PM to encourage Her Majesty to dissolve parliament in order that Her Privy Counsel can reconstruct the constitution to overcome the lack of confidence the British public now have in the Government and MP’s.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
